Ability.Name: Vigilance
Ability.Lua:
if not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
local mytarget = nil local mytargethp = 0 local doneVG = nil local allinrange = true local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = UnitHealthMax(member) if UnitBuffID(member,50720,"PLAYER") then doneVG = 1 end if not UnitInRange(member) then allinrange = false end if memberhp > mytargethp and UnitInRange(member) and not UnitIsUnit("player",member) and not UnitBuffID(member,50720) and UnitGroupRolesAssigned("target") ~= "HEALER" then mytarget = member mytargethp = memberhp end end
if mytarget and not doneVG and allinrange and not UnitIsDead(mytarget) then PQR_CustomTarget = mytarget return true end
end
